Aggregate Migration Summary

Overview

4 Projects Analyzed
100% Average Automated Migration Coverage
Total Code Lines: 108
Migratable Code Lines: 108
Non-migratable Code Lines: 0
0.0 days Manual Work Estimation

Note:

  • 4 MuleSoft projects analyzed for migration to Ballerina
  • 100% average automated conversion rate across all projects
  • Code lines are weighted based on their complexity, when calculating the percentage
  • Time estimates shown above represents manual work required to complete migration for all projects combined

Estimation Scenario: Time measurement: 1 day = 8 hours, 5 working days = 1 week

  • 2.0 hours per each new unsupported element code line for analysis, implementation, and testing
  • 15.0 minutes per each repeated unsupported element code line for implementation
  • 1.5 minutes per each unsupported dataweave code line for translation
  • Assumes medium complexity with moderate implementation challenges

textEdits.Ballerina.toml:
[package]
org = "mule_migrator"
name = "apiKitProject"
version = "0.1.0"
distribution = "2201.12.3"

[build-options]
observabilityIncluded = true

notifications.report:
